name: Victoria Falls
description: One of the world's largest waterfalls, offering dramatic scenery and adrenaline-pumping activities like white-water rafting and bungee jumping.

name: Maasai Mara National Reserve
description: A world-famous wildlife sanctuary known for the Great Migration exceptional view and incredible big cat sightings under a beautiful sunset.

name: Table Mountain
description: A flat-topped mountain offering panoramic views of Cape Town, accessible by hiking trails or a scenic cableway.

name: Zanzibar Island
description: A tropical paradise known for white-sand beaches, turquoise waters, and a rich blend of African, Arab, and European cultures.

name: Sahara Desert
description: The world's largest hot desert offering sand dune adventures, camel rides, and star-studded desert nights.

name: Bazaruto Archipelago
description: A group of pristine islands with coral reefs, marine life, and luxurious eco-resorts perfect for a quiet getaway.

name: Nyungwe Forest National Park
description: A biodiverse rainforest filled with chimpanzees, hiking trails, and Africa's longest canopy walk.

name: Lekki Art Market
address: Oba Elegushi Street, Lekki, Lagos, Nigeria
description: A vibrant craft market showcasing Nigerian art, textiles, sculptures, and handmade souvenirs.
